Method Detail

deliverBytes

protected void deliverBytes(byte[] bytes)
Description copied from class: MulticastComms
deliverObject is the method for delivering received objects. Typically this method will cast the object and pass it to an appropriate handler. This may include handing off the delivery to another thread.

Overrides:

setIgnoring

public void setIgnoring(View ignoringUpdate)
determine which nodes to ignore if any. This will be called from the connection set - ignoring is used in a critical section in deliverObject() that uses connectionSet as its monitor.
